# MSCriticalMessagingAuthorizationStatus.approved

**Case**

A person has approved a request to use the Critical Messaging API.

## Declaration

```swift
case approved
```

## Discussion

The framework returns this value when someone approves a request to use the API.

## Authorization statuses

- **MSCriticalMessagingAuthorizationStatus.unknown**: The authorization status is unknown.
- **MSCriticalMessagingAuthorizationStatus.denied**: A person has denied permission to use the Critical Messaging API.

items.description: A person has denied permission to use the Critical Messaging API.
